summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 FORD FUSION. WHILE DRIVING 70 MPH, THE POWER STEERING FAILED TO TURN LEFT OR RIGHT WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO DRIVE THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO A DEALER. THE DEALER (REYNOLDS MOTOR CO LOCATED AT 1900 AVENUE OF THE CITIES, EAST MOLINE, IL 61244; (888) 201-4658) WAS CONTACTED AND STATED THAT THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN A RECALL. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 178,000.
